content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area at position(0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0) - currently working on iron plates
- Stone furnace at position(2,0) - currently idle but contains iron plates

###Copper Smelting Area at position(4,4) 
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) - currently idle but contains copper plates
- Stone furnace at position(6,4) - currently idle but contains copper plates

###Power Generation System at position(-2.5,24)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5) - working, producing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler - currently contains water
- Boiler at position(-2.5,24) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine at position(4.5,24.5) - not working due to no steam input
- Second pipe network from boiler to engine - currently empty
- Electric pole network with poles at positions (8.5,2.5), (8.5,14.5), (8.5,18.5), (8.5,6.5), (8.5,10.5), (6.5,24.5)

###Research Lab
- Lab containing 65 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics but inactive due to no power

ERROR TIPS

### Power system errors
- Keep monitoring boiler fuel levels to prevent power outages
- Ensure steam connections between boiler and engine are properly maintained

### Resource management errors
- Check inventory before attempting to insert materials into furnaces
- Maintain adequate stockpiles of basic resources (coal, iron ore, copper ore)

### Research errors
- Cannot set research that has prerequisites not yet completed (e.g. Electronics requires Automation)
- Ensure power system is working for research to progress

### Inventory capacity errors
- Check furnace inventory capacity before inserting new materials
- Remove processed materials from furnaces before adding new raw materials

### Crafting errors
- Cannot craft items that require machine assembly (like iron gear wheels) by hand
- Use appropriate crafting machines for items that cannot be hand crafted
